|character          = Klee
|date               = 2023-07-27
|zh                 = ;今天是可莉的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''可莉，我们来啦。
:'''派蒙：'''噫——怎么有这么多蹦蹦炸弹？
:'''可莉：'''不是哦，这是懒懒蹦蹦。懒懒蹦蹦天天睡觉，不会爆炸的。
:'''派蒙：'''哦…还好还好，不然小可莉又要被关禁闭了。
:'''旅行者：'''所以可莉请我们过来帮忙，是做懒懒蹦蹦吗？
:'''可莉：'''对，可莉希望懒懒蹦蹦可以陪在大家身边，让大家多一个朋友哦。
:'''派蒙：'''好耶，谢谢小可莉。
:'''旅行者：'''唔…那要不要做个「懒懒派蒙」试试看？
:'''派蒙：'''什么嘛！
|dialogue_review_zh = 可莉希望懒懒蹦蹦可以陪在大家身边，让大家多一个朋友哦。
|en                 = ;Today is [[Klee]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Traveler:''' Klee, we are here.
:'''Paimon:''' Wait, why are there so many Jumpty Dumpties here?
:'''Klee:''' Nah, these are Lazy Dumpties. Lazy Dumpties sleep every day, so they do not explode.
:'''Paimon:''' Oh... that's nice, or else Klee will be grounded again.
:'''Traveler:''' So you are asking us to help making Lazy Dumpties?
:'''Klee:''' That's right, Klee hopes that these Lazy Dumpties can stay beside everyone and be friends with them.
:'''Paimon:''' That's great, thanks Klee.
:'''Traveler:''' Well, how about we try making a "Lazy Paimon"?
:'''Paimon:''' Stop talking about that!
|dialogue_review_en = Klee hopes that these Lazy Dumpties can stay beside everyone and be friends with them.
